events.title: Vedic Period
events.description: A transformative era in ancient India that laid the foundation for Hindu traditions, including the composition of the Vedas.

events.title: Rise of Vaishnavism
events.description: The development of Vaishnavism, a major Hindu denomination, incorporating regional traditions and the idea of Vishnu as the supreme god.

events.title: Maurya Empire Founded
events.description: Chandragupta Maurya establishes the Maurya Empire, leading to one of the largest empires in Indian history.

events.title: Golden Age of Gupta Empire
events.description: The Gupta Empire sees a cultural and scientific flourishing, marking the Golden Age of India.

events.title: Mughal Empire Founded
events.description: Babur establishes the Mughal Empire, which grows to be one of the largest and most prosperous in Indian history.

events.title: Independence and Partition
events.description: India gains independence from British rule in 1947, but is divided into two countries, India and Pakistan, leading to significant challenges.
